'''Snapdragons''' are a [[Cooking Ingredient]] found in the wild in [[Mondstadt]] and [[Liyue]].

==How to Obtain==
Snapdragons grow on beaches and riverbanks of Mondstadt and Liyue, mainly near the river from [[Windrise]] to [[Falcon Coast]], around [[Cider Lake]], around [[Bishui Plain]] and in the gorges of [[Minlin]].

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=92 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.
